data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Another module that I've been remiss in registering. The module
    creates sorting networks (not to be confused with computer
    connectivity networks), through three different algorithms that the
    user can choose.

    It's a specialized application for fixed-sized arrays that may need
    to be sorted. It will also produce a graphical output that's useful
    for teaching.
